```{r}
library(ggpubr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

df<-read_excel("handedness.xlsx",sheet="data")

```

```{r}





df<-df %>%count(Handedness, Lateralization)
df$Handedness <- factor(df$Handedness, levels=c("Right", "Amb", "Left", "Unknown"))
df$Lateralization <- factor(df$Lateralization, levels=c("left-lat","bi-lat","right-lat"))

fig<-ggplot(df, aes(x=Handedness, y=n, fill=Lateralization)) + 
  geom_bar(position = 'dodge', stat='identity') +
  geom_text(aes(label=n), position=position_dodge(width=0.9), vjust=-0.25)


fig<-ggplot(df, aes(fill=Lateralization,x=Handedness,y=n)) + geom_bar(position=position_dodge(.9),stat='identity') + ggtitle('Handedness counts by Lateralization (determined by activation extent)')
ggsave('test.tiff',fig)

```
